game.assets

Class Assets

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.assets.Assets

  • public class Assets
extends Object
    Class for containing all the resources of the game (textures, sounds). All the asset variables are public static. Uses ImageLoader to load all the images at start and crops all the sprites from sprite sheets using SpriteSheet. (This class will be divided to Dimensions and Assets later when I have time for refactoring)
    Author:
    Eero Kuurne
